Example_1.review: I heart King's. I've always been a fan and this one was as good as my old one in Monaca.
Example_1.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong liking for King's and indicates a positive past experience with the brand, which is consistent at the new location.
key_phrases: as good as my old one

Example_2.review: Love this place. Never had a bad meal. Good portions and great people. Be ready to stand in line.
Example_2.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong positive feelings towards the restaurant, praising the quality of the meals, the portion sizes, and the staff. The mention of a line suggests popularity, which can be seen as a positive, despite the slight inconvenience it might cause.

Example_3.review: Great little place. Treats you like a local.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Same overtime. Barb is always here.
Example_3.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by describing the place as great and appreciating the local treatment. The frequency of visits suggests a strong positive experience, and the mention of a staff member by name implies a personal connection.

Example_4.review: Far away from real Chinese food. Doesn't even taste good as American style Chinese food.
Example_4.explanation: The speaker values real Chinese food over American style Chinese food, and they believe that the restaurant doesn't measure up to their already lowered expectations of American style Chinese food.

Example_5.review: Papa J's is expensive and inconsistent. The ambiance is nice but it doesn't justify the prices. There are better restaurants in Carnegie.
Example_5.explanation: The reviewer is dissatisfied with the value for money, citing high prices and inconsistency in quality. While they acknowledge a positive aspect, the nice ambiance, it is not enough to offset their overall negative view, especially when they believe there are better options available.

Example_6.review: I love this place! The food is always so fresh and delicious. The staff is always friendly, as well.
Example_6.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment with phrases indicating consistent quality of food and service.
key_phrases: food is always so fresh and delicious

Example_7.review: Some of the best chow around--love this place. The bread and salads and soups are great.
Example_7.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the food quality and their affection for the place, using superlatives and positive language.
key_phrases: Some of the best chow around
The bread and salads and soups are great

Example_8.review: The worst dental office I ever been. No one can beat it!!! You should avoid it at any time.
Example_8.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the dental office.
key_phrases: The worst dental office I ever been
You should avoid it at any time

Example_9.review: Its clean, open 24/7 with hot shoe string fries and creative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??
Example_9.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm about the restaurant's offerings, particularly praising the milkshakes and fries. The rhetorical question at the end suggests a high level of satisfaction.

Example_10.review: Had a great time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Friendly staff. Will return.
Example_10.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, mentioning a great time, friendly staff, and an intention to return, all of which indicate satisfaction with the restaurant.

Example_11.review: Waterfront Lowe's beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden. Hate to admit it, but it's true.
Example_11.explanation: The reviewer is comparing two locations and expressing a preference for one over the other specifically for lawn and garden products. The use of 'beats' indicates a positive sentiment towards Waterfront Lowe's, while 'Hate to admit it' suggests some reluctance or surprise in their finding.
key_phrases: beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden
Hate to admit it, but it's true

Example_12.review: i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was a SUPER bitch and RUDE \nHope they fire her..
Example_12.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment towards the bartender's behavior, which significantly impacts their overall experience. However, they also mention having fun with the games, indicating some positive aspects.
key_phrases: the bartender Melissa was a SUPER bitch and RUDE
i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!

Example_13.review: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always good. Food is excellent and the service staff is friendly.
Example_13.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the food quality and service staff, and while they miss a particular beer, they still enjoy the specialty beers offered.

Example_14.review: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables. I can see my salad is ready at the window. Worst serves ever.
Example_14.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the service, emphasizing that it is the worst they have experienced. The specific complaints about servers chatting and not attending to tables, along with the observation of their salad being ready but not served, indicate a negative experience.
key_phrases: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables
I can see my salad is ready at the window

Example_15.review: The food was okay. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening. Awful acoustics!
Example_15.explanation: The reviewer finds the acoustics and noise level to be very negative aspects of their experience, which significantly impacted their enjoyment. The food being 'okay' suggests a neutral or slightly positive experience with the cuisine itself.

Example_16.review: The worse \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really bad. Please don't eat this food.
Example_16.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the food quality. They go as far as to advise others not to eat at the restaurant.

Example_17.review: This place.. Is ok if ur grabn something quick .. But they do have a great happy hour tho
Example_17.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral opinion about the restaurant's offerings for a quick grab but has a positive view of the happy hour, which suggests a mixed sentiment leaning more towards the positive side.
key_phrases: ok if ur grabn something quick

Example_19.review: Food was ok had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was ok not a lot of flavor.
Example_19.explanation: The reviewer finds the food to be just 'ok', indicating a lack of enthusiasm. The lack of flavor is a significant negative point, but the overall experience isn't described as bad, just not particularly good.

Example_20.review: Love the stores selection but HATE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I wanted to know I'd ask !!!
Example_20.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong dislike for the aggressive sales tactics, which significantly impacts their experience. However, they also indicate a positive sentiment towards the store's selection, showing a mix of emotions.
key_phrases: HATE how the girls chase you around
If I wanted to know I'd ask

Example_21.review: This store has such bad service. The service staff are rude rude rude. Save your money, shop elsewhere.
Example_21.explanation: The reviewer is emphasizing the poor quality of service and the rudeness of the staff, which are significant negative aspects of their experience. The advice to 'save your money, shop elsewhere' suggests a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: service staff are rude rude rude

Example_22.review: They make a nice breakfast for less than the tip form dinner the night before. That's not bad!
Example_22.explanation: The reviewer seems to appreciate the value for money, indicating that the breakfast was good and comparatively inexpensive.
key_phrases: less than the tip from dinner the night before

Example_23.review:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
Very good food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap
Great service
Very clean (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a
Example_23.explanation: The reviewer provides a list of positives with strong praise for the food, service, and cleanliness, and makes a point to differentiate the restaurant from lower-quality establishments. No cons are listed, indicating a very positive experience.

Example_24.review: Service an atmosphere was great. I had the shrimp boil and it was very under-seasoned. Much closer to bland than anything.
Example_24.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service and atmosphere, which is a good aspect. However, the main course, the shrimp boil, was not up to their expectations in terms of flavor, being described as 'very under-seasoned' and 'bland'. The negative aspects regarding the food carry significant weight in a restaurant review.

Example_25.review: Good pizza and i love the breadsticks...i don't know too much else about this place
Example_25.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive feelings about the food they did try, specifically the pizza and breadsticks, which are often key items at a pizza place. The lack of further knowledge about the restaurant does not detract from their positive experience with what they did try.

Example_26.review: Great service, friendly staff, great food, great prices. What more can you ask for in a small town breakfast place? Will definitely be back
Example_26.explanation: The reviewer is highly satisfied with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including service, staff, food, and prices, and expresses a clear intent to return.
key_phrases: Great service, friendly staff, great food, great prices
What more can you ask for

Example_27.review: A great little place. Delicious and affordable Italian food. Great salads and pasta. Try the pizza rolls!
Example_27.explanation: The reviewer uses positive adjectives such as 'delicious', 'affordable', and 'great' to describe the food and the place, and even provides a recommendation, which indicates a high level of satisfaction.

Example_28.review: Horrifying. This place should be ashamed of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond dirty, just absolutely rank.
Example_28.explanation: The reviewer uses very strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very high level of dissatisfaction with the restaurant.

Example_29.review: Cookies aren't bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is friendly and it smells like heaven.
Example_29.explanation: The reviewer has a positive view of the staff and the ambiance of the place, indicated by the friendly staff and pleasant smell. The comment on the cookies is neutral to slightly positive, suggesting they are acceptable but not exceptional. The lack of commentary on cakes or other pastries does not necessarily indicate a negative sentiment, just a lack of experience with those items.

Example_30.review: Prices not great for true thrifters. Staff completely useless. No dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.
Example_30.explanation: The reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with the staff and the prices, which are critical aspects of a shopping experience. The lack of dressing rooms is another negative point. The overall tone is negative, indicating a poor experience.
key_phrases: Prices not great for true thrifters

Example_31.review: First time here and I wasnt impressed at all! I should have gone to the dairy queen :-(
Example_31.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations for their first visit but was left completely unimpressed, to the point where they regret not choosing a fast-food alternative.
key_phrases: should have gone to the dairy queen

Example_32.review: There was absolutely nothing not to like. Reasonably priced wines, home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.
Example_32.explanation: The reviewer expresses complete satisfaction with the restaurant, highlighting the lack of negatives, the value of the wine, the quality of the cooking, and the positive atmosphere.

Example_33.review: Tasteless food that arrived over an hour after it was ordered and was cold. Will never order from here again.
Example_33.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the food's lack of flavor, the excessive delivery time, and the temperature of the food upon arrival. The statement about not ordering again indicates a very negative experience.
key_phrases: arrived over an hour after it was ordered

Example_35.review: I love tazza.. Their coffees are excellent and its a great place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..
Example_35.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by using words like 'love', 'excellent', and 'great'. They also list multiple items they enjoy, indicating a broad satisfaction with the offerings.
key_phrases: great place to enjoy a relaxing evening
I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies

Example_36.review: Best coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a pleasure.
Example_36.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive opinion, stating it's the best coffee in the city and endorsing the positive reputation of the place. They also mention a long-term positive experience with every visit.

Example_37.review: This is where I learned what good espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some great neighborhood atmosphere.
Example_37.explanation: The reviewer has had a positive learning experience regarding the taste of good espresso at this location and associates it with a great neighborhood atmosphere. The recommendation to stop there if in Highland Park suggests a positive endorsement.
key_phrases: If you make it to Highland Park, stop there

Example_38.review: Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states... I'd say this is the best cappuccino I've had since Italy.
Example_38.explanation: The reviewer expresses difficulty in finding good coffee in the states, which sets a negative tone initially. However, they follow up with high praise for the cappuccino, comparing it favorably to those in Italy, which is known for its coffee.
key_phrases: best cappuccino I've had since Italy
Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states

Example_39.review: I wish we had a way to hold this corporation accountable for its crimes against our society.
Example_39.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language indicating a deep dissatisfaction with the corporation's impact on society. The desire to hold the corporation accountable suggests a serious grievance.

Example_40.review: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Great mix of people and music with decent bartenders and good prices on beer.
Example_40.explanation: The reviewer uses the word 'great' multiple times, indicating a strong positive sentiment. They appreciate the mix of people and music, the quality of service from the bartenders, and the pricing of the beer.
key_phrases: Great mix of people and music

Example_41.review: Absolutely amazing! Great staff and service! Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!
Example_41.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'absolutely amazing' and 'best' to describe their experience, indicating a very high level of satisfaction. Positive comments about the staff, service, and music contribute to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down.

Example_42.review: Waiting 20 minutes to get one piece of wood cut in an empty store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!
Example_42.explanation: The reviewer is using sarcasm with the word 'Priceless!' to express frustration about the wait time, especially given that the store was empty. The expectation would be a quicker service.
key_phrases: Waiting 20 minutes to get one piece of wood cut

Example_43.review: I like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are reliable. Great option for take out food.
Example_43.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment towards the pizza and the selection of toppings, and they appreciate the reliability and take out option of the restaurant.
key_phrases: Great option for take out food

Example_44.review:
Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is awful
No wine, but that's PA's fault
Best organic food
Example_44.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment about the quality of the food, which is often the most important aspect of a restaurant review. The negative comments about parking and the lack of wine are attributed to external factors rather than the restaurant itself.
key_phrases: No wine, but that's PA's fault

Example_45.review: Parking is tough, the food selection is great, and if you call ahead they will set aside awesome moving boxes for you.
Example_45.explanation: The positive sentiment regarding the great food selection outweighs the negative sentiment about parking. The additional service of setting aside moving boxes is seen as a positive aspect.
key_phrases: they will set aside awesome moving boxes for you

Example_47.review: Very tasty food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but worth it if you want something better than a typical chain.
Example_47.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiment about the taste of the food and drinks, and they feel that the higher price is justified by the quality, which they perceive as better than what is offered by typical chains.

Example_48.review: pretty good veggie food. I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty decent variety.
Example_48.explanation: The reviewer has had multiple meals at the restaurant and mentions a variety of dishes they've tried, indicating a positive experience. The use of 'pretty good' and 'pretty decent' suggests satisfaction but not overwhelming enthusiasm.
key_phrases: I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here

Example_49.review: My favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, not greasy, timely delivery, they know my orders!
Example_49.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear preference for this restaurant, indicating it is their favorite in the area. Positive attributes such as the style of the food, lack of greasiness, and timely delivery contribute to a positive experience. The personal touch of the restaurant knowing their orders adds to the sentiment.
key_phrases: Flat New York style, not greasy

Example_50.review: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so bad but I probably won't go back... Too heavy for me...
Example_50.explanation: The reviewer had a neutral to slightly negative experience, indicating the food was 'not so bad' but not to their preference due to it being 'too heavy'. The likelihood of not returning suggests a lack of enthusiasm for the restaurant.

Example_51.review: Kind of small, but I've had excellent luck with produce here: fresh and organic. In-store coffee bar is a nice plus.
Example_51.explanation: The reviewer has had positive experiences with the quality of the produce, emphasizing its freshness and organic nature. The mention of a coffee bar adds to the positive sentiment. The size of the place is noted but doesn't seem to detract significantly from the overall positive experience.
key_phrases: In-store coffee bar is a nice plus

Example_52.review: Don't go. I got more problems and sounds on my car after I spent $800 there. unbelievable!
Example_52.explanation: The reviewer is issuing a strong warning against visiting the restaurant, indicating that their experience was highly negative, especially after spending a significant amount of money.

Example_53.review: Get a Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top - absolutely amazing!
Example_53.explanation: The use of 'absolutely amazing' indicates a very positive experience. The specific recommendation of the 'Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top' suggests that the speaker is enthusiastic about this particular menu item.
key_phrases: Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top

Example_54.review: I have had lots of items off of their large menu and everything has been good.
Example_54.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with all the items they've tried from a large menu, indicating a positive experience without any specific complaints.

Example_55.review: Mmmmm. Their Egg drop soup is sooo good as is the General Tso's, and they deliver FAST!
Example_55.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm and satisfaction with the quality of the food and the speed of delivery, which are both important aspects of a positive dining experience.

Example_56.review: Horrible - they use chicken that's been out uncover all day . And they smoke around the food.:(
Example_56.explanation: The use of the word 'Horrible' immediately sets a negative tone. The reviewer's concern about food safety with chicken being left out all day and smoking around the food indicates serious health and hygiene issues.
key_phrases: chicken that's been out uncover all day

Example_57.review: Incredible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just phenomenal. So is the mozzarella cheese. Great fish. Expensive but worth it!
Example_57.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language such as 'incredible' and 'phenomenal' to describe the food, and despite the high cost, they feel it is justified by the quality.

Example_58.review: good food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but well worth the money, classic.
Example_58.explanation: The reviewer positively describes the food as 'good' and justifies the high price by stating it is 'well worth the money', indicating satisfaction with the quality. The term 'classic' suggests a positive view of the restaurant's offerings.

Example_60.review: Real german food (sausage, etc) and decent beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the good joints.
Example_60.explanation: The reviewer positively highlights the authenticity of the food, the quality of the beer, and the atmosphere of the restaurant, which suggests a positive experience.

Example_61.review: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was terriable, service was worse! Went and got Sushi!
Example_61.explanation: The reviewer uses hyperbole to express their dissatisfaction with both the food and service, indicating a very negative experience. The fact that they left to get sushi elsewhere underscores their disappointment.

Example_62.review: A Pittsburgh tradition. Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel (of course) for dessert. Yum
Example_62.explanation: The use of 'Yum' indicates a positive experience. The recommendation to try specific dishes suggests satisfaction with the food. The reference to 'A Pittsburgh tradition' implies a positive cultural or local appreciation.
key_phrases: Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel

Example_63.review: This is americanized German food. For real German food, go to Hofbrauhaus and ask for a schnitzel.
Example_63.explanation: The reviewer is making a distinction between the authenticity of the restaurant's food and what they consider 'real' German food. They suggest another restaurant for a more authentic experience, which implies dissatisfaction with the current restaurant's offerings.
key_phrases: For real German food, go to Hofbrauhaus

Example_64.review:
The old arcade game was excellent and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks nice enough .
Bartenders were really nice.
 NIce enough place.
Example_64.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the bartenders, the arcade game, and the drinks, using the word 'nice' multiple times, which indicates a generally positive experience.
key_phrases: The old arcade game was excellent

Example_65.review: You really need to try's this place. Great sandwiches, a hot dog/sausage cart, and friendly service!
Example_65.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about recommending the restaurant, praising the quality of the sandwiches and the friendliness of the service. The mention of a hot dog/sausage cart adds to the positive experience.

Example_66.review: Estimated delivery time 45 minutes actually delivery time 120 minutes.\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of last resort.
Example_66.explanation: The significant delay in delivery time is a major inconvenience and a negative aspect of the service. The phrase 'pizza of last resort' suggests that the speaker views this restaurant as an option only when no other is available, indicating a lack of enthusiasm for the establishment.

Example_67.review: It wasn't as horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will be fine.
Example_67.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to negative reviews but found the experience better than anticipated. They suggest adjusting expectations to avoid disappointment.
key_phrases: wasn't as horrid as the reviews
Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart

Example_68.review: Awesome spot to grab a dog for a buck. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and friendly service.
Example_68.explanation: The reviewer seems pleased with the value and service, using 'awesome' to describe the spot and 'friendly' for the service. The mention of 'nothing fancy' suggests a level of expectation that was met.
key_phrases: grab a dog for a buck

Example_69.review: This place is amazing from top to bottom. 2 hours down we are still here.
Example_69.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language ('amazing', 'from top to bottom') indicating a very positive experience. The fact that they have stayed for a long time ('2 hours down we are still here') suggests they are enjoying their time and are not in a hurry to leave.

Example_70.review: The Steelers are the coolest team in football. They have the best colors, city, history, most fans, etc. \n\nAnd they pretty much dominate.
Example_70.explanation: The reviewer expresses high enthusiasm and positive sentiment towards the Steelers, using superlatives such as 'coolest' and 'best' and a strong term like 'dominate' to describe the team's performance.
key_phrases: best colors, city, history, most fans

Example_71.review:
A ring for each finger and a sixth for my... 

other hand! 

You're dirty!

Go Steelers!!!
Example_71.explanation: The review does not contain any relevant information about the restaurant's food, service, or atmosphere. It appears to be off-topic and does not provide any sentiment towards the restaurant experience.

Example_72.review: It's cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star.\n\nNote: this is a review of the baseball club, not the stadium in which they play
Example_72.explanation: The use of the word 'cathartic' suggests deep dissatisfaction, and the phrase 'sorry organization' indicates a strong negative sentiment. The reviewer explicitly states their desire to give a 1-star rating.
key_phrases: cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star

Example_73.review: Go Pirates!!! That's all I can say. They've made me love baseball and Pittsburgh again. They're only going to get better.
Example_73.explanation: The reviewer expresses a renewed love for baseball and Pittsburgh, which is a strong positive sentiment. The enthusiasm for the Pirates and the optimistic outlook for the future add to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: They've made me love baseball and Pittsburgh again
They're only going to get better

Example_74.review: Very disappointed. Delivery was late, our gyros were cold and fries were soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.
Example_74.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with both the delivery service and the quality of the food. The use of 'very' emphasizes their disappointment, and the statement about not ordering again indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: gyros were cold and fries were soggy

Example_75.review: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and basketball on the television so no complaints.
Example_75.explanation: The reviewer seems satisfied with the beer selection and the availability of sports entertainment. The term 'Standard Pittsburgh dive' might imply a lack of uniqueness, but it does not necessarily carry a negative connotation.
key_phrases: They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap

Example_76.review: Good coffee, nice walking street, good selection of teas and little gifty things, good pastries, *excellent* scones, and it's not that other green-logo'd coffee place.
Example_76.explanation: The use of 'excellent' to describe the scones indicates a very positive experience. The repetition of 'good' for coffee, selection, and pastries, as well as the appreciation for the location and the fact that it's not a chain, suggests overall satisfaction.
key_phrases: good selection of teas and little gifty things

Example_77.review: Nice neighborhood coffee. Small but always seems to have room. Good selection of teas also.. Good scones and pastries. CT dos have some specialty blends.
Example_77.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the good selection of teas and the quality of scones and pastries, which are positive aspects. The mention of 'Nice neighborhood coffee' suggests a pleasant atmosphere, and the comment about always having room indicates convenience.

Example_78.review:
First, I love CTR's coffee.
Second, this location has great batistas and it's less congested than other CTR'S I've been to. 

That about covers it
Example_78.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the coffee and compliments the staff and the atmosphere of the location, indicating a high level of satisfaction.

Example_79.review: sushi was dry and unenjoyable. the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal. I was not a fan and probably won't be back.
Example_79.explanation: The primary focus of the review is the quality of the sushi, which is described negatively. The addition of the customer's lack of fandom and inclination not to return further emphasizes their dissatisfaction. The positive note about cleanliness and decor does not outweigh the negative dining experience.
key_phrases: I was not a fan and probably won't be back
the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal

Example_80.review: Pool hall and pretty crappy bar. Not much else to write home about. Was not a fan and won't be back here.
Example_80.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the bar and expresses a clear dislike for the place, indicating they have no intention of returning.

Example_81.review: One of the best pastries I've had in my life I got here. I think it's called a \"French bearclaw.\"
Example_81.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very high level of satisfaction with the pastries, specifically mentioning a 'French bearclaw' and qualifying it as one of the best they've had in their life, which indicates a very positive experience.
key_phrases: One of the best pastries I've had in my life

Example_82.review: Sorry, but our pizza was cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings didn't taste like garlic. Maybe it was an off night?
Example_82.explanation: Receiving cold pizza is generally a significant negative aspect of a dining experience, and the wings not tasting as expected adds to the disappointment. The reviewer seems to give the benefit of the doubt by suggesting it might have been an off night, indicating some hope that this isn't the usual experience.
key_phrases: garlic wings didn't taste like garlic
Maybe it was an off night?

Example_83.review: Didn't live up to my expectations at all. Waste of time and money. Sloooooow service.
Example_83.explanation: The reviewer had expectations that were not met, indicating a negative experience. The phrases 'waste of time and money' and 'slow service' strongly suggest dissatisfaction with the overall experience at the restaurant.
key_phrases: Didn't live up to my expectations

Example_84.review: Mediocre and poorly made! You can get better quality food from Mcdonalds don't waste your time or money
Example_84.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the food quality, comparing it unfavorably to fast food and advising others not to spend time or money there.
key_phrases: don't waste your time or money

Example_85.review: Draft selections are good...service is lousy...food is sub par. Not in a hurry to return.
Example_85.explanation: The reviewer is clearly dissatisfied with the service and the quality of the food, which are critical aspects of a dining experience. However, they did find a positive aspect in the draft selections, which prevents the review from being completely negative.
key_phrases: Not in a hurry to return

Example_86.review: Good local bar with lots of TVs, good draft selection, and better than average bar food. Definitely a step up from the Saloon.
Example_86.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the quality of the bar food, which they consider better than average, and they also value the selection of drafts and the number of TVs. The comparison to another establishment suggests a positive experience.
key_phrases: good local bar with lots of TVs

Example_87.review: Great food and very reasonable prices.  Really enjoy the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.
Example_87.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the food quality, enjoyment of specific menu items, and appreciation for the pricing.

Example_88.review: Great food and atmosphere. Sweet potato waffle fries are the best. Great for Pirate games.
Example_88.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the food, a specific menu item, and the suitability of the restaurant for enjoying before or after sports events.
key_phrases: Sweet potato waffle fries are the best

Example_89.review: The wings here are fantastic and the cheese sticks are absurd in a very good way. Will definitely be back.

Example_175.review: Pamela is a bad representation of this location! Attitude and lack of hygiene is an issue for this \"employee.\" I will not return.

Example_176.review: Large selection of unique/cute-tastic gifts. Humerous knick-knacks/books galore. Very adorable and staff was very pleasant. Looking forward to going back again.

Example_178.review: I got tired of waiting in line with one register open and 10 people in front of me. Won't be back.

Example_180.review: Friendly front desk. A little condescending toward the back. Lovely jewelry, extensive collection of lovely things. Well worth a visit for unique gifts.

Example_252.review: The worst restaurant ever! It doesn't matter if the food tastes good or not.. The service is the worst! Lazy and slow as ever!
Example_252.explanation: The reviewer is extremely dissatisfied with the service, which they describe as the worst, lazy, and slow. The quality of the food is irrelevant to them due to the poor service.

Example_253.review: Great place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was great. Friendly staff .. Very pleased.
Example_253.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with multiple aspects of their experience, including the food, service, and staff, and specifically mentions a positive occasion (birthday dinner).
key_phrases: The food and service was great

Example_254.review: Good, honest food, at a fair price, made by cheerful folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.
Example_254.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the quality of the food, the price, and the service. The use of 'good, honest food' and 'cheerful folk' indicates a positive experience, and 'rarely disappointed' suggests consistent satisfaction over time.

Example_255.review: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awesome. $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I drink soda.
Example_255.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the value of the Tuesday Special, indicating a positive experience with the price and what is offered. The mention of it being the only day they drink soda suggests a special occasion, adding to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink
It's usually the only day that I drink soda

Example_256.review: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was excellent, chocolate Sauce was scrumptious !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is amazing!!
Example_256.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the quality of the food and the service they received, mentioning specific items they enjoyed and naming the servers who contributed to their positive experience.
key_phrases: Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers

Example_257.review: Good food and flavor. Cold greeting at hostess desk. Service good. I would go back.
Example_257.explanation: The positive comments about the food and service suggest a generally good experience, despite the less welcoming initial interaction. The intent to return to the restaurant indicates an overall positive sentiment.

Example_258.review: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was not expecting much having lived on the Gulf Coast but was pleasantly surprised.
Example_258.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to their experience with Gulf Coast cuisine but ended up having a positive experience with the meal they ordered.

Example_259.review: Dinner food is high quality/fresh and the recipes are interesting.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus.
Example_259.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the quality and freshness of the food, finds the recipes interesting, and appreciates the bonus of fresh pear butter and biscuits.
key_phrases: Fresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus

Example_260.review: Fish and chips were great. People should not come here for lunch and discuss business. Enjoy your meal as if it were your last.
Example_260.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment about the food quality, specifically the fish and chips. However, there is a suggestion that the atmosphere may not be suitable for business discussions, which could be interpreted as a mild critique or simply advice. The final phrase seems to encourage savoring the meal, which implies a positive experience with the food.
key_phrases: People should not come here for lunch and discuss business
Enjoy your meal as if it were your last

Example_261.review: First and last to this club. Very pricy,poor service and no contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....
Example_261.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with multiple aspects of the club, including the service, pricing, and the lack of contact dance, which is likely an important feature for them. They also compare it negatively to other clubs in the area.

Example_262.review: Great place. Excellent experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Amazing! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.
Example_262.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'Great', 'Excellent', and 'Amazing' to describe their experience and the main dish they had. The enthusiasm is further emphasized by the hypothetical willingness to give a rating beyond the maximum.

Example_263.review: We had a wonderful, authentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was friendly, I rushed. Can't wait to return!
Example_263.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the authenticity and quality of the meal, appreciated the friendly service, and is eager to return, indicating a high level of satisfaction.

Example_264.review: I can't think of anything due to my food coma but it was all five stars! The blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish.
Example_264.explanation: The reviewer is extremely satisfied with their experience, to the point of being in a 'food coma,' which is often used to describe a state of being very full and satisfied after eating a large, enjoyable meal. They explicitly mention a five-star experience and praise a specific item, the blackberry sorbet.
key_phrases: blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish

Example_265.review: Nice hotel, nice warm cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would recommend to out of towners.
Example_265.explanation: The reviewer has a positive experience, mentioning the hotel's niceness and the warm cookies as highlights. The fact that they have stayed multiple times and would recommend the hotel to others indicates a strong positive sentiment.

Example_266.review: Average pizza at best and sub-par appetizers. Decent beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.
Example_266.explanation: The reviewer is clearly disappointed with the food, describing the pizza as 'average at best' and the appetizers as 'sub-par'. However, they acknowledge a positive aspect with 'decent beer specials', which prevents the lowest rating. The suggestion to eat elsewhere for 'real pizza' indicates a strong negative sentiment towards the pizza quality.
key_phrases: Decent beer specials are only upside

Example_267.review: Really. Good. Pizza. Great variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a good meal, eat here.
Example_267.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the quality of the pizza with a positive tone and also appreciates the variety of beer and wine. The recommendation to eat here if in downtown suggests a positive experience.
key_phrases: Great variety of beer and wine
want a good meal, eat here

Example_268.review: Jerk chicken pizza was excellent. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Great beer selection. Service was good.
Example_268.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the jerk chicken pizza and the beer selection, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. The service also receives a positive mention. The only mild criticism is about the balance of flavors in the 'Bomber', but it is still described as good.

Example_269.review: Sorry- just doesn't do it for me. The steak is average and it's over run by BoA middle management.
Example_269.explanation: The reviewer apologizes before expressing their dissatisfaction, indicating a negative sentiment. The steak being described as 'average' suggests mediocrity, and the mention of being 'over run by BoA middle management' implies a negative atmosphere or experience.
key_phrases: just doesn't do it for me
over run by BoA middle management

Example_270.review: This is a classic steak house. Good service and great food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's worth it.
Example_270.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with both the food and service, and they also suggest that the higher cost is justified by the quality of the experience.

Example_271.review: One of the best Steakhouses, always consistent. Great food and service. You can people watch at the bar
Example_271.explanation: The reviewer expresses high praise for the steakhouse, highlighting its consistency and quality of both food and service. The additional comment about people watching suggests an enjoyable atmosphere.

Example_272.review: This is heaven for steak lovers like me! High quality and moody...I enjoyed my time very well.
Example_272.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive sentiment, using phrases that indicate a high level of satisfaction with the quality of the steak and the overall experience.

Example_273.review: Nice antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, tons of tv's and a huge bar. Would visit again!
Example_273.explanation: The reviewer seems pleased with the atmosphere and amenities such as the TVs and bar, and the intent to revisit indicates a positive experience.
key_phrases: tons of tv's and a huge bar

Example_274.review: Just another liberal bias rag.  It's only redeeming use, is for lining bird cages and starting fires.
Example_274.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the restaurant, indicating a very negative sentiment. The phrase 'liberal bias rag' suggests a deep dissatisfaction with the establishment's atmosphere or offerings, and the mention of its 'only redeeming use' being for 'lining bird cages and starting fires' is a clear indication of disdain.
key_phrases: lining bird cages and starting fires

Example_275.review: Average bar with a nice outdoor area. You can go cornholing there which is fun.\n\nWish the beer selection was better.
Example_275.explanation: The reviewer finds the bar to be average, which suggests a neutral sentiment. They express a desire for a better beer selection, which is a mild negative. However, the presence of a nice outdoor area and the option to play cornhole add positive aspects to the experience.
key_phrases: Wish the beer selection was better

Example_276.review: Go sit at the Bar. The drinks are great and the SUSHI is very good. The women in there are smokin hot.
Example_276.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the quality of the sushi and drinks, which are central to their experience. The comment about the women is not directly related to the food or service quality but adds to the positive atmosphere as perceived by the reviewer.
key_phrases: women in there are smokin hot

Example_277.review: Great place to salsa dance on a Saturday night!! A brief lesson is given by some great professionals-check it out!!
Example_277.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the salsa dancing and the quality of the lessons provided by professionals, suggesting a positive experience.
key_phrases: brief lesson is given by some great professionals

Example_278.review: Convenient parking and great exhibit - Body Worlds. The IMAX is wonderful - beware lots of kids everywhere!
Example_278.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the exhibit, the IMAX, and the convenience of parking. The mention of 'lots of kids everywhere' could be seen as a slight negative, but it doesn't seem to detract significantly from the overall positive experience.

Example_279.review: It reminded me of the dirty restroom at the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Dirty and nasty.
Example_279.explanation: The reviewer is making a very negative comparison between the restaurant and a dirty restroom, which suggests a strong negative sentiment towards the cleanliness of the restaurant.

Example_280.review: Disgusting, slow and pathetic. Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is subpar. Skip unless starving
Example_280.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a high level of dissatisfaction with both the service and the food quality.
key_phrases: Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them

Example_281.review: Nice, friendly staff. WIsh they had what I had come in for. Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....
Example_281.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the staff, indicating good customer service, but their primary need was not met as the product they were looking for was not available. The mention of a specific product, Carmex, suggests a specific unmet expectation.
key_phrases: Wish they had what I had come in for

Example_282.review: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but clean. Great water pressure and fantastic location. Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi.
Example_282.explanation: The reviewer gives a balanced view of the hotel. They mention a negative aspect (hard beds) but also note that it is clean. The positive aspects such as great water pressure, fantastic location, and a tip for free wifi indicate a generally positive experience.
key_phrases: Great water pressure and fantastic location
Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi

Example_283.review: We had our company holiday party here and it was an AMAZING time! Great atmosphere and all of the catering staff were courteous and helpful.
Example_283.explanation: The reviewer had a very positive experience, emphasizing the quality of the event with words like 'AMAZING' and 'Great'. The positive experience is further supported by the mention of the staff's good service.

Example_284.review: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant closed on 08/15/2009. I always wanted to try this place, I'm sad to see it go....
Example_284.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment about not having the chance to try the restaurant before it closed, indicating a negative sentiment due to missed opportunity rather than direct experience with the food or service.
key_phrases: I'm sad to see it go
I always wanted to try this place

Example_285.review: The staff rocks (and they tell me the food is good, too). Forget your plans; you could wind up staying here all night.
Example_285.explanation: The reviewer is very positive about the staff and has heard good things about the food, suggesting a good overall experience. The suggestion to forget plans indicates a strong endorsement of the restaurant's atmosphere and the potential to enjoy a long visit.
key_phrases: they tell me the food is good, too
you could wind up staying here all night

Example_286.review: Went here on a weekday night. I didn't like it and I probably won't be back.
Example_286.explanation: The reviewer explicitly states a negative experience with 'I didn't like it' and indicates a lack of intent to return, which suggests a strong negative sentiment.

Example_287.review: Hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all fresh, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes dry and not so good.
Example_287.explanation: The reviewer had mixed experiences with the food quality, indicating some items were not fresh and some dishes were not prepared well, but they did find a positive aspect in the homefries.
key_phrases: Omlettes dry and not so good
veggies were all fresh, no way
Hit and miss for lunch and summer

Example_288.review: Kevin was excellent- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very happy with service & would highly recommend.
Example_288.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong satisfaction with the service, particularly praising Kevin and the efficiency of the service. They also indicate a willingness to recommend the service to others, which shows a high level of satisfaction.

Example_289.review: Better than expected. Many salad bar items, excellent corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but good food! Staff very attentive.
Example_289.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, with the food being better than they expected and specific praise for the corn bread and salad bar items. The fact that both the reviewer and their BF cleared their plates suggests satisfaction with the meal. The mention of attentive staff also contributes to a positive experience.

Example_290.review: Great park for family fun. They even host music festivals there which is fantastic. Something for everyone for sure!
Example_290.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the park, mentioning it is great for family fun and highlighting the music festivals as a fantastic feature. The inclusive statement that there is 'something for everyone' suggests a very positive experience.
key_phrases: They even host music festivals there which is fantastic

Example_291.review: Awesome rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrific! We went on a Friday and there were no lines! What more can you ask for?
Example_291.explanation: The use of multiple exclamation marks after 'Awesome rides' indicates a high level of enthusiasm. The reviewer also positively notes that the rides were terrific for both children and adults, and the absence of lines is seen as a significant positive. The rhetorical question 'What more can you ask for?' suggests that the reviewer's expectations were fully met or exceeded.
key_phrases: Both children and adults rides were terrific!

Example_292.review: Carowinds is a fun place.....where else can you spend $4 on a bottle of water?!
Example_292.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by stating that the place is fun, but this is somewhat tempered by the sarcastic remark about the high price of water, which suggests a negative aspect of the experience.
key_phrases: spend $4 on a bottle of water

Example_293.review: Worst customer service ever. The manager is rude and talks bad about the client and little care for his customer
Example_293.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the customer service, specifically pointing out the manager's behavior as both rude and disrespectful towards clients. The use of 'worst' indicates a very negative experience.

Example_294.review: it was ok. \n\nmussels were good. service ok. ambiance seemed dated. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.
Example_294.explanation: The reviewer had a mixed experience. They found the mussels to be good and the visit worth a trip, but they are uncertain about returning, possibly due to the dated ambiance and only okay service.
key_phrases: not sure I would go back

Example_295.review: Thumbs up, great wine selection and atmosphere. Must try the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.
Example_295.explanation: The reviewer gives a positive endorsement ('Thumbs up') and specifically praises the wine selection and atmosphere, as well as recommending a dish (Scallops). The ability to accommodate a large group is also seen as a positive.

Example_296.review: Great setting. Big restaurant but great service. Mediterranean. Halibut was killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. A gem!
Example_296.explanation: The reviewer uses positive language throughout the review, with 'killer' in this context meaning excellent. They also compliment the service and describe the restaurant as a 'gem', indicating a very positive experience.

Example_297.review: White tuna sushi was great! But the Pad Thai just ok. Next time i'll stick to the sushi
Example_297.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the white tuna sushi, which is a highlight of the review. However, their experience with the Pad Thai was only average. The intention to return for the sushi indicates a generally positive sentiment.
key_phrases: But the Pad Thai just ok
Next time i'll stick to the sushi

Example_298.review: Quick, decent nothing amazing. the fried rice was good and egg drop soup decent. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.
Example_298.explanation: The reviewer finds the service quick and the food decent, with a positive note that the fried rice was good. However, the use of 'nothing amazing' suggests that while the experience was satisfactory, it wasn't exceptional.

Example_299.review: Worst auto bell in town. Do not go here. It wasn't even decent enough for one star.
Example_299.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language indicating a very bad experience. They advise against going to the restaurant and feel it doesn't deserve the lowest rating.
key_phrases: wasn't even decent enough for one star

Example_300.review: I have only been once. Nice staff. Quality ingredients. Tasty and fresh cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
Example_300.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, mentioning the quality of the food and the staff. The use of 'Yum!' indicates a particularly enjoyable meal.
key_phrases: Tasty and fresh cold cut subs
